thread.section_title: Hotel Wales - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Home away from home
thread.title_full: Home away from home - Review of Hotel Wales, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CRLondontravel
title: Home away from home
text:
Because of work, I stay every year for two weeks at the Hotel Wales. The location is great, close to the Museum mile and Carnegie Hill is a charming and quiet neighbourhood.
The staff know me and they are helpful and make my stay as pleasant and convenient as possible.
The room I stayed in this time was maybe a bit old fashioned in its decor but the whole place exudes a charm which you don't get in bigger hotels.
Thank you very much and I hope to be back next year!
